abstract: The semantic meaning for a text input area.
overview:
## Discussion

Use this property to give the system information about the expected semantic meaning for the content that people enter. For example, you might specify [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextContentType/emailAddress] for a text field that people fill in to receive an email confirmation.

For possible values you can use, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextContentType]; by default, the value of this property is `nil`.

# contentType

**Instance Property**

The semantic meaning for a text input area.

## Declaration

```swift
var contentType: NSTextContentType? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to give the system information about the expected semantic meaning for the content that people enter. For example, you might specify [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextContentType/emailAddress] for a text field that people fill in to receive an email confirmation.

For possible values you can use, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextContentType]; by default, the value of this property is `nil`.

## Specifying content type

- **NSTextContentType**: Constants that identify the semantic meaning for a text-entry area.
